entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 early this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
